item.title: CVE-2024-8197|2024-08-27T10:59:48.789Z -- freakingwildchild -- visual%20sound
item.description: The Visual Sound plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 1.03. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on a function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the plugin's settings via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
